mapper.select: SELECT acq_gender, acq_interest, acq_dt FROM tb_acquisition WHERE sbs_seq = #{sbs_seq} AND acq_dt = current_date and s.sbs_status = 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into tb_acquisition (acq_gender, acq_interest, acq_start_dt, acq_end_dt, acq_tid, sbs_seq) values(#{acq_gender}, #{acq_interest}, TO_DATE(#{acq_start_dt},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{acq_end_dt},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{acq_tid}, (select s.sbs_seq from tb_subscription s, tb_device d where s.device_seq = d.device_seq and d.device_uid = #{device_uid} and s.sbs_status = 'Y'))
mapper.select: select nvl(max(acq_tid),0) as max_tid from tb_acquisition where sbs_seq = (select sbs.sbs_seq from tb_subscription sbs inner join tb_device dev on sbs.device_seq = dev.device_seq and sbs.sbs_status = 'Y' and dev.device_uid = #{device_uid})
mapper.update: update tb_acquisition a set a.acq_gender = #{acq_gender}, a.acq_interest = #{acq_interest}, a.acq_start_dt = TO_DATE(#{acq_start_dt},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), a.acq_end_dt = TO_DATE(#{acq_end_dt},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') where a.acq_tid = #{acq_tid} and a.sbs_seq = (select s.sbs_seq from tb_subscription s, tb_device d where s.device_seq = d.device_seq and d.device_uid = #{device_uid} and s.sbs_status = 'Y')
